name: Peanut Butter Cookies
author: Donna Essner
instructions: In a large bowl, combine first seven ingredients, blend well. Stir in remaining ingredients, blend well. Shape into 1 inch balls. Place 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten in crisscross pattern with fork dipped in sugar. Bake at 350Â° for 7 to 8 minutes or until golden brown. Immediately remove from cookie sheet.
